name: Readymade Contraptions of Descent
description:
The followup to their acclaimed acclaimed debut, Readymade Contraptions of Descent is released as a 10" vinyl.

Track listing:

Side A:
  1. Readymade Contraptions of Descent
  2. The Prophecy
  3. Totentanz
Side B:
  1. Me Punk, You Fuck! (Trashcan Darlings cover)
  2. On Your Knees (Live)
  3. Ease Your Pain (Live)

name: Period Three Implies Chaos (DigiPak)
description:
The debut full length album of Norwegian Death/Thrash metal band Imbalance available as an exclusive DigiPak CD. Eleven tracks of technical and brutal thrash metal on the borderline between thrash and death metal.

"The Soundtrack to Armageddon" (9.5/10) -- Brave Words & Bloody Knuckles

"This is some of the best death thrash I've ever heard!" (10/10) -- heavymetal.no

"...in meinen Ohren definitiv zu den Highlights im Jahre 2010 gehören wird." (6/6) -- heavyhardes.de

"Imbalance from Norway releases with "Period Three Implies Chaos" an extremely strong debut album" (4/5) -- igelmetal.de

Track listing:

  1. Dies Irae
  2. Period Three Implies Chaos
  3. Hemisphere of Blood
  4. Hellfire
  5. On Your Knees
  6. Like From an Open Wound
  7. A Furore Normannorum Libera Nos Domine (Part 1)
  8. Deprivation
  9. Burial of Consciousness
  10. Bestial by Nature
  11. Ease Your Pain

name: Real Fucking Tribute - a tribute to Trashcan Darlings
description:
We're damned pleased to be taking part in the release of "Real Fucking Tribute!" – a CD where 15 bands from Oslo pay tribute to our hometown glam-/sleazepunk legends Trashcan Darlings. Imbalance is featured with a cover of "Me Punk, You Fuck!"

Full track listing:

Slömber - Psychotic Barbie
Viper Cult - So Whore
Gatecrashers - Electro Shock Rock
Imbalance - Me Punk, You Fuck
Tom Ølboks - Barbed Wire Boogie
Stingray - Bad Reputation
Natural Born Darlings - Rights of the Living Dead
Borderline Bitches - Peggy-Sue er Dau
Sugar Louise - Drag me Down
Stookers - Back to the Parti
Riots - Running out of Time
Hollywood Vampires - (She's a) Fuck Around
Powertops - Jeg vil bare Dø
The Pussyclub - Holiday in my Head
TJ Kokomo - Peggy-Sue is Dead

name: Period Three Implies Chaos/Readymade Contraption of Descent (USB/Bullet)
description:
We've upgraded our bullet shaped USB stick so that you now get both the debut Period Three Implies Chaos and the followup Readymade Contraptions of Descent in one awesome package! The best part: We've kept the price the same as before. This is an offer lasting only until we're out of the bullets! If you already have the previous USB bullet, send us an email, and we'll fix you an upgrade!

Some reviews:

"The Soundtrack to Armageddon" (9.5/10) -- Brave Words & Bloody Knuckles

"This is some of the best death thrash I've ever heard!" (10/10) -- heavymetal.no

"...in meinen Ohren definitiv zu den Highlights im Jahre 2010 gehören wird." (6/6) -- heavyhardes.de

"Imbalance from Norway releases with "Period Three Implies Chaos" an extremely strong debut album" (4/5) -- igelmetal.de

Track listing:

Period Three Implies Chaos

  1. Dies Irae
  2. Period Three Implies Chaos
  3. Hemisphere of Blood
  4. Hellfire
  5. On Your Knees
  6. Like From an Open Wound
  7. A Furore Normannorum Libera Nos Domine (Part 1)
  8. Deprivation
  9. Burial of Consciousness
  10. Bestial by Nature
  11. Ease Your Pain

Readymade Contraptions of Descent

Side A:
  1. Readymade Contraptions of Descent
  2. The Prophecy
  3. Totentanz
Side B:
  1. Me Punk, You Fuck! (Trashcan Darlings cover)
  2. On Your Knees (Live)
  3. Ease Your Pais (Live)

name: Handmade Belt Buckle in Leather
description: Here's a treat, a belt buckle featuring the Imbalance decagram in real leather handmade by a true Norwegian pagan. These buckles are handmade in small quantities on demand! Delivery time may be a few weeks.
